themes.brief: The type Date allows to input dates in many various forms.
themes.details:
Use functions date2* to convert a date formated as a type Date to some converted units.
See help Date to obtain the detailed formats.
themes.author: Alain Klotz

themes.brief: The type Angle allows to input angles in many various forms.
themes.details:
Use functions angle2* to convert an angle formated as a type Angle to some converted units.
See help Angle to obtain the detailed formats. A very interesting function is angle2sexagesimal wich allows to set the unit, separators and number of digits.
themes.author: Alain Klotz
